snippet: The top-ranked American women’s team is in a pool with No. 2 Brazil and No. 5 China for the London Olympics. The American men are in a pool with top-ranked Brazil and No. 2 Russia.
abstract: American women’s volleyball team is in a pool with Brazil and China for the 2012 Olympics; the American men are in a pool with Brazil and Russia.
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked American women’s team is in a pool with No. 2 Brazil and No. 5 China for the London Olympics. The American men are in a pool with top-ranked Brazil and No. 2 Russia.

headline.seo: U.S. Men and Women Olympic Volleyball Groups Are Set
headline.main: U.S. Men and Women Olympic Volleyball Groups Are Set
